Title: Grants a special apportionment to certain school districts for certain public pension liabilities
Summary: Grants a special apportionment to school districts having a population of between 195,000 and 219,000, for additional expenses incurred in the 2023-2024 and 2024-2025 school years associated with changes in public pension liabilities.
LawCode: Amd Part M ยง10, Chap 57 of 2005
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part M of chapter 57 of the laws of 2005, amending the education law relating to providing for school budget revote, in relation to a special apportionment for public pension accruals
